column2: BRIEF-Western Asset Mortgage Capital Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.52 May 7 (Reuters) - Western Asset Mortgage Capital Corp : * QTRLY CORE EARNINGS PLUS DROP INCOME OF $14.1 MILLION, OR $0.34 PER BASIC AND DILUTED SHARE * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $19 MILLION VERSUS $18 MILLION IN Q4 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
